Deprecated API

Deprecated Classes
com.jidesoft.swing.ButtonPanel
          replaced by ButtonPanel under com.jidesoft.dialog. 
com.jidesoft.plaf.eclipse.EclipseMetalLookAndFeel
          Due to the change in LookAndFeelFactory, this class is no longer needed. The best way to set any L&F is to use UIManager.setLookAndFeel() as usual. then call installJideExtension() or installJideExtension(int style) to add UIDefaults needed by JIDE products. 
com.jidesoft.plaf.eclipse.EclipseWindowsLookAndFeel
          Due to the change in LookAndFeelFactory, this class is no longer needed. The best way to set any L&F is to use UIManager.setLookAndFeel() as usual. then call installJideExtension() or installJideExtension(int style) to add UIDefaults needed by JIDE products. 
com.jidesoft.swing.GlobalEventQueue
          use AWTEventListener instead. 
com.jidesoft.plaf.office2003.Office2003WindowsLookAndFeel
          Due to the change in LookAndFeelFactory, this class is no longer needed. The best way to set any L&F is to use UIManager.setLookAndFeel() as usual. then call installJideExtension() or installJideExtension(int style) to add UIDefaults needed by JIDE products. 
com.jidesoft.plaf.vsnet.VsnetMetalLookAndFeel
          Due to the change in LookAndFeelFactory, this class is no longer needed. The best way to set any L&F is to use UIManager.setLookAndFeel() as usual. then call installJideExtension() or installJideExtension(int style) to add UIDefaults needed by JIDE products. 
com.jidesoft.plaf.vsnet.VsnetWindowsLookAndFeel
          Due to the change in LookAndFeelFactory, this class is no longer needed. The best way to set any L&F is to use UIManager.setLookAndFeel() as usual. then call installJideExtension() or installJideExtension(int style) to add UIDefaults needed by JIDE products. 
 

Deprecated Interfaces
com.jidesoft.swing.GlobalEventHandler
          use AWTEventListener instead. 
 

Deprecated Methods
com.jidesoft.docking.DockingManager.autohideFrame(DockableFrame, int, int)
          use DockingManager.autohideFrame(String, int, int) instead. 
com.jidesoft.docking.DefaultDockingManager.autohideFrame(DockableFrame, int, int)
          use DefaultDockingManager.autohideFrame(String, int, int) 
com.jidesoft.plaf.LookAndFeelFactory.create(String)
          replace by installJideExtension(). You can set to whatever L&F as before, then call installJideExtension() or installJideExtension(int style) to add UIDefaults needed by JIDE products. 
com.jidesoft.icons.ColorFilter.createDimmedImage(Image)
          the name is wrong. Replaced by createBrighterImage(). 
com.jidesoft.docking.DockingManager.dockFrame(DockableFrame, int, int)
          use DockingManager.dockFrame(String, int, int) instead. 
com.jidesoft.docking.DefaultDockingManager.dockFrame(DockableFrame, int, int)
          use DefaultDockingManager.dockFrame(String, int, int) instead. 
com.jidesoft.docking.DockingManager.floatFrame(DockableFrame, Rectangle, boolean)
          use DockingManager.floatFrame(String, java.awt.Rectangle, boolean) instead. 
com.jidesoft.docking.DefaultDockingManager.floatFrame(DockableFrame, Rectangle, boolean)
          use DefaultDockingManager.floatFrame(String, java.awt.Rectangle, boolean) instead 
com.jidesoft.grid.Property.getDesciption()
          mispelled. Use setDescription instead 
com.jidesoft.document.IDocumentPane.getDocuments()
          As of JIDE Components 1.1, replaced by getDocuments 
com.jidesoft.document.DocumentPane.getDocuments()
          As of JIDE Components 1.1, replaced by DocumentPane.getDocumentNames() 
com.jidesoft.docking.DockContext.getInitdDockSide()
          a typo. Replaced by getInitSide(). 
com.jidesoft.docking.DockContext.getInitSideIndex()
          used getInitIndex() instead 
com.jidesoft.combobox.ListComboBox.getList()
          this method is not very useful. If you want to customize the list, create your own list. 
com.jidesoft.docking.DockingManager.getMainFrame()
          use getRootPaneContainer instead since DockingManager can support all RootPaneContainer, not just JFrame 
com.jidesoft.docking.DefaultDockingManager.getMainFrame()
          use getRootPaneContainer instead since DockingManager can support all RootPaneContainer, not just JFrame 
com.jidesoft.docking.DockingManager.getSelectedFrame()
          replaced by DockingManager.getActiveFrame(). This is nothing with this method. It's just the two terms - selected frame v.s. active frame - confused users. As the dockable frame event uses active and deactive, it makes more sense to use active frame. 
com.jidesoft.docking.DefaultDockingManager.getSelectedFrame()
          replaced by DefaultDockingManager.getActiveFrame(). This is nothing with this method. It's just the two terms - selected frame v.s. active frame - confused users. As the dockable frame event uses active and deactive, it makes more sense to use active frame. 
com.jidesoft.combobox.TreeComboBox.getTree()
          this method is not very useful. If you want to customize the tree, create your own tree. 
com.jidesoft.wizard.DefaultWizardPage.initConentPane()
          replaced by initContentPane(). The old method name is misspelled. 
com.jidesoft.swing.GlobalEventQueue.setBlockingEnabled(boolean)
          As of JIDE Component 1.1, replaced by setEnabled. 
com.jidesoft.plaf.LookAndFeelFactory.setDefaultLookAndFeel()
          replace by installJideExtension(). You can set to whatever L&F as before, then call installJideExtension() or installJideExtension(int style) to add UIDefaults needed by JIDE products. 
com.jidesoft.grid.Property.setDesciption(String)
          mispelled. Use getDescription instead 
com.jidesoft.swing.JideSplitPane.setDividerLocation(JideSplitPaneDivider, int)
          use JideSplitPane.setDividerLocation(int, int) so that you don't need to get the divider instance first. 
com.jidesoft.docking.DockContext.setInitdDockSide(int)
          a typo. Replaced by setInitSide(int). 
com.jidesoft.docking.DockContext.setInitSideIndex(int)
          used setInitIndex(int) instead 
com.jidesoft.status.ProgressStatusBarItem.setInterminate(boolean)
          use ProgressStatusBarItem.setIndeterminate(boolean) instead 
com.jidesoft.action.CommandBar.setMenuBar(boolean)
          if you want to use CommandBar as menu bar, you should just use CommanMenuBar. CommandMenuBar extends CommandBar and automatically setMenuBar(true). In addition, it will work well under Mac OS X when it is used as screen menu bar. 
com.jidesoft.document.DocumentComponent.setName(String)
          Name is passed in from contructor of DocumentComponent. End user shouldn't call setName directly. If you want to change the name, use DocumentPane.renameDocument(java.lang.String, java.lang.String). 
com.jidesoft.document.DocumentPane.setTabbedPaneCustomer(DocumentPane.TabbedPaneCustomizer)
          use setTabbedPaneCustomizer. 
 

Deprecated Constructors
com.jidesoft.pane.CollapsiblePane()
          Always use the constructors with parameters 
com.jidesoft.icons.ColorFilter(boolean, int)
          use getInstance instead to reuse the same instance 
com.jidesoft.docking.DockableFrame(String)
          replace by DockableFrame(String key, Icon frameIcon) because DockableFrame needs an icon when in auto-hide mode. 
com.jidesoft.icons.MaskFilter(Color, Color)
          use getInstance instead to reuse the same instance
